camel.source.path.channel.name: camel.source.path.channel
camel.source.path.channel.description: The channel used for subscribing/publishing events

camel.source.endpoint.uuid.name: camel.source.endpoint.uuid
camel.source.endpoint.uuid.description: UUID to be used as a device identifier, a default UUID is generated if not passed.

camel.source.endpoint.bridgeErrorHandler.name: camel.source.endpoint.bridgeErrorHandler
camel.source.endpoint.bridgeErrorHandler.description: Allows for bridging the consumer to the Camel routing Error Handler, which mean any exceptions occurred while the consumer is trying to pickup incoming messages, or the likes, will now be processed as a message and handled by the routing Error Handler. By default the consumer will use the org.apache.camel.spi.ExceptionHandler to deal with exceptions, that will be logged at WARN or ERROR level and ignored.

camel.source.endpoint.withPresence.name: camel.source.endpoint.withPresence
camel.source.endpoint.withPresence.description: Also subscribe to related presence information

camel.source.endpoint.exceptionHandler.name: camel.source.endpoint.exceptionHandler
camel.source.endpoint.exceptionHandler.description: To let the consumer use a custom ExceptionHandler. Notice if the option bridgeErrorHandler is enabled then this option is not in use. By default the consumer will deal with exceptions, that will be logged at WARN or ERROR level and ignored.

camel.source.endpoint.exchangePattern.name: camel.source.endpoint.exchangePattern
camel.source.endpoint.exchangePattern.description: Sets the exchange pattern when the consumer creates an exchange. One of: [InOnly] [InOut] [InOptionalOut]

camel.source.endpoint.basicPropertyBindi.name: camel.source.endpoint.basicPropertyBinding
camel.source.endpoint.basicPropertyBindi.description: Whether the endpoint should use basic property binding (Camel 2.x) or the newer property binding with additional capabilities

camel.source.endpoint.pubnub.name: camel.source.endpoint.pubnub
camel.source.endpoint.pubnub.description: Reference to a Pubnub client in the registry.

camel.source.endpoint.synchronous.name: camel.source.endpoint.synchronous
camel.source.endpoint.synchronous.description: Sets whether synchronous processing should be strictly used, or Camel is allowed to use asynchronous processing (if supported).

camel.source.endpoint.authKey.name: camel.source.endpoint.authKey
camel.source.endpoint.authKey.description: If Access Manager is utilized, client will use this authKey in all restricted requests.

camel.source.endpoint.cipherKey.name: camel.source.endpoint.cipherKey
camel.source.endpoint.cipherKey.description: If cipher is passed, all communications to/from PubNub will be encrypted.

camel.source.endpoint.publishKey.name: camel.source.endpoint.publishKey
camel.source.endpoint.publishKey.description: The publish key obtained from your PubNub account. Required when publishing messages.

camel.source.endpoint.secretKey.name: camel.source.endpoint.secretKey
camel.source.endpoint.secretKey.description: The secret key used for message signing.

camel.source.endpoint.subscribeKey.name: camel.source.endpoint.subscribeKey
camel.source.endpoint.subscribeKey.description: The subscribe key obtained from your PubNub account. Required when subscribing to channels or listening for presence events

camel.component.pubnub.bridgeErrorHandle.name: camel.component.pubnub.bridgeErrorHandler
camel.component.pubnub.bridgeErrorHandle.description: Allows for bridging the consumer to the Camel routing Error Handler, which mean any exceptions occurred while the consumer is trying to pickup incoming messages, or the likes, will now be processed as a message and handled by the routing Error Handler. By default the consumer will use the org.apache.camel.spi.ExceptionHandler to deal with exceptions, that will be logged at WARN or ERROR level and ignored.

camel.component.pubnub.basicPropertyBind.name: camel.component.pubnub.basicPropertyBinding
camel.component.pubnub.basicPropertyBind.description: Whether the component should use basic property binding (Camel 2.x) or the newer property binding with additional capabilities
